description: Single storey front extension; conversion of garage to habitable room; external alterations
decision_conditions: The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

<p>The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:</p><p><span style="line-height: 107%;">Site Location Plan;
Reasonable Exception Statement; 224038/01; 224038/03.</span><br></p>
The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
